alt: A Pride Flag hangs off a building on June 24, 2020 in New York City.
article_heading: Companies are caving to anti-DEI crusaders. That’s bad for business
description: The image depicts a vibrant, rainbow-colored flag fluttering against a backdrop of a clear sky. The flag is composed of six distinct colors, each representing a different hue of the rainbow: red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple. The flag is waving slightly, suggesting a gentle breeze. In the background, there is a tall building with numerous windows, which appears to be a skyscraper. The building's facade is made of reflective glass, and it has a series of vertical lines that run along its exterior, possibly indicating balconies or architectural features. The overall scene suggests an urban environment, possibly in a city center, with the flag possibly indicating a celebration or a show of support for LGBTQ+ rights. The image is a photograph with natural lighting, capturing the colors of the flag and the building in a realistic manner.

alt: Nvidia headquarters in Santa Clara, California.
article_heading: Nvidia has more than just billions of dollars in value to lose if its stock keeps falling

alt: Any signs of a shift in the economy's trajectory could force former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris to tweak their messaging.
article_heading: This week could shift the focus of a key narrative for Harris and Trump
description: The image is a split-screen of two individuals, both appearing to be middle-aged adults, likely politicians given their attire and the context of the image. On the left side, there is a man with a fair complexion, short blonde hair, and a stern expression. He is wearing a dark suit with a red tie and a pin on the left lapel, which is a common accessory for politicians. The background is blurred, but it seems to be an indoor setting with a stage or podium, suggesting that this could be a political event or press conference.  On the right side, there is a woman with a fair complexion, long brown hair, and a serious expression. She is wearing a white blazer over a white blouse, and there is a pin on the left lapel, similar to the man's attire. The background is also blurred, but it appears to be a similar indoor setting with a stage or podium, indicating that this could be the same event as the man's appearance.  Both individuals are looking slightly to their left, and their expressions suggest they are engaged in a serious discussion or presentation. The image is a photograph, and the style is typical of news media or political event coverage.

alt: Nvidia has ridden the AI hype wave to become one of the most valuable brands on the planet, achieving a $3 trillion valuation that puts it among giants like Apple and Microsoft.
article_heading: The thrill of AI is fading — and Wall Street is getting a little more clear-eyed about its actual value
description: The image shows a collection of electronic components and devices, likely from a computer or gaming system, displayed against a dark background. On the left side, there is a laptop with its screen facing the viewer, revealing a keyboard and trackpad. The laptop appears to be closed, with the screen and keyboard visible. In the center, there is a graphics card with a blue circuit board and a heat sink, which is typically used to dissipate heat generated by the graphics processing unit (GPU). To the right, there is a fan with a metallic finish, which is likely used for cooling purposes. The fan has a circular design with a central hub and blades radiating outward. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the items, which gives a sense of the components being displayed in a showcase or exhibition setting. There are no visible texts or logos that provide brand names or model information. The style of the image is a product photograph with a focus on the items, using a dark background to highlight the details of the components.

The image depicts a modern, futuristic-looking vehicle in motion on a road. The vehicle has a sleek, aerodynamic design with a smooth, curved front and a sloping windshield. It features a distinctive, angular side profile with a prominent front wheel arch and a set of large, black wheels. The body of the car appears to be made of a reflective, metallic material that gives it a shiny, chrome-like appearance.  The vehicle is driving on a road that is bordered by a concrete barrier on one side and a line of trees on the other, suggesting a rural or semi-rural setting. The trees are blurred, indicating that the car is moving at a high speed. The sky is overcast, and the lighting suggests it could be either dawn or dusk, with the light coming from the side, casting a soft glow on the vehicle and the road.  The overall impression is one of a high-tech, eco-friendly vehicle that is designed for speed and efficiency. The design elements and the context of the image suggest that this could be a concept car or a prototype for a new model, possibly from a luxury or high-end automotive brand.

alt: These days, companies, including grocery store chains, are harnessing huge amounts of data to fine-tune their pricing power. Some folks aren't thrilled about that.
article_heading: Surge pricing your groceries: What could go wrong?

alt: Donald Trump and Elon Musk seem to enjoy the banter, but the logistics of getting Musk into a Cabinet role are daunting. And Wall Street would hate it.
article_heading: Let’s throw cold water on the Musk working for Trump thing
description: The image is a split-screen comparison of two men, both appearing to be middle-aged, with one side showing a man with a more youthful appearance and the other side showing a man with a more mature appearance. The man on the left side has a fair complexion, blonde hair, and is wearing a blue suit with a red tie. He has a serious expression on his face. The man on the right side has a darker complexion, dark hair, and is wearing a black suit with a white shirt. He also has a serious expression on his face.
